#Test file for dialogues
#
#Use following format:
#
#*Character*: frog
#*Text*: blah blah blah blah blah
#blah blah blah blah
#>>>>>
#
#If the same character speaks several times in a row you don't need to write the character again (only do when the character changes)
#


*Character*: frog

*Text*: Hi, I'm a frog.
>>>>>
*Text*: I talk a lot!
>>>>>
*Text*: Now I need to test a long sentence so... AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH! I wonder if this is enough...
>>>>>

*Character*: beaver

*Text*: 
>>>>>

*Character*: crab

*Text*: ...
>>>>>

*Character*: otter

*Text*: Are you ok?
>>>>>

*Character*: salmon

*Text*: *Drowns*
>>>>>

#
#Use one text file for each conversation
